name: LocusPlay
overview:
LocusPlay is a lottery technological platform, specially designed for lottery operators, agents and mobile vendors, enabling them to deliver and manage their lottery games online and on mobile.

LocusPlayâ€™s remotely-operated management console provides Operators with all of the tools necessary to manage their growing lottery business.

Locusplay’s Lottery system runs completely independent of any specific hardware system. The integrated Lottery management system also enables operators to offer lottery games online and on mobile (Smartphone or via SMS betting).

Besides offering powerball software system, LocusPlay also provides services such as product tailoring, Existing lottery system upgrades, Software consultancy and etc.

To better understand the product and offerings of LocusPlay,it is advised to request for a product Demo of their lotto software.
